TEXT.TITLE: TOWLE MANUFACTURING CO <QTOW> YEAR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss 4.71 dlrs vs loss 14.09 dlrs Oper loss 22 mln vs loss 67.2 mln NOTE: 1986 loss excludes gain on the sale of Gold Lance Corp of 12.1 mln dlrs. Company is operating under chapter 11. Reuter
